ScriptProcessor.Name: EventProcessor0
ScriptProcessor.script:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Multidimensional Polyphonic Expression (MPE) -- -- map x to pitch, z to gain by default (can be disabled) -- and send x, y, z on ScriptEventModulations 2, 1, 0 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
local X_To = Menu {"X", {"None", "Pitch", "Mod 2 (Bi)"}, selected = 2, displayName = "Pitch (X)"} X_To.tooltip = "Mod source or parameter driven by the X axis. (Mod 2 is the Script Event Modulation with Event Id 2" .. " where modulation is relative (use Bipolar))" moveControl(X_To, 1, 1) local PitchBendRange = NumBox {"PitchBendRange", 48, 12, 48, true, displayName = "PB Range", tooltip = "Pitch Bend Range"} moveControl(PitchBendRange, 1, 3) PitchBendRange.tooltip = "PitchBend range in Semitones. Usually 24 or 48"
local Y_To = Menu{"Y", {"None", "PolyAT", "Mod 1 abs (Uni)", "Mod 1 rel (Bi)"}, selected = 2, displayName = "Timbre (Y)"} Y_To.tooltip = "Mod source driven by the Y axis. (Mod 1 is the Script Event Modulation with Event Id 1" .. " where modulation is either absolute (use Unipolar) or relative (use Bipolar))" moveControl(Y_To, 2, 1)
local Z_To = Menu{"Z", {"None", "Gain", "PolyAT", "Mod 0 abs (Uni)", "Mod 0 rel (Bi)"}, selected = 2, displayName = "Pressure (Z)"} Z_To.tooltip = "Mod source or parameter driven by the Z axis. (Mod 0 is the Script Event Modulation with Event Id 0" .. " where modulation is either absolute (use Unipolar) or relative (use Bipolar))" moveControl(Z_To, 3, 1) local InitialPressure = NumBox{"InitialPressure", 0, 0, 1, displayName="Init Pressure", tooltip = "Initial Pressure"} InitialPressure.tooltip = "Initial value for Z axis when not yet sent by the controler" moveControl(InitialPressure, 3, 3)
local GlobalChannel = NumBox { "GlobalChannel", 1, 1, 16, true, displayName = "Global Channel", tooltip = "Global MIDI Channel"} GlobalChannel.tooltip = "MIDI Channel where are sent global commands in order to control all voices at once" moveControl(GlobalChannel, 4, 2) local GainMap = Menu{"GainMap", {"20dB", "z^2", "Linear"}, displayName = "Gain Map"} GainMap.tooltip = "Automatic gain remapping when Z axis is used to control Gain" moveControl(GainMap, 5, 1)
function onInit() Part:setParameter("MidiChannel", -1) -- put channel in omni mode end
local ids = {} local state = {} for ch=1,16 do state[ch] = {} state[ch].id = nil state[ch].note = nil state[ch].initialBend = nil state[ch].initialTimbre = nil state[ch].initialpressure = nil end
local pressureToGaindB = function (p) local dB = -12 + 20 * p local g = math.pow(10.0, dB / 20) return g end
local pressureToGaindQuad = function (p) return p * p end
local pressureToGainLinear = function (p) return p end
local pressureToGainFunctions = {pressureToGaindB, pressureToGaindQuad, pressureToGainLinear} local pressureToGain = function(p) return pressureToGainFunctions[GainMap.value](p) end
function onNote(e) local ch = e.channel or 1 -- can happen if there is no channel like when sent from the UI local n = e.note local id = postEvent(e)
state[ch].id = id state[ch].note = n
ids[id] = {} ids[id].note = n
local bend = state[ch].initialBend or 0 local timbre = state[ch].initialTimbre or 0 local pressure = state[ch].initialpressure or InitialPressure.value
sendXValue(bend, id, ch) sendYValue(timbre, id, ch) sendZValue(pressure, id, ch, true) end
function onRelease(e) local ch = e.channel or 1 -- can happen if there is no channel like when sent from the UI postEvent(e) if ch ~= GlobalChannel.value then if state[ch].id ~= nil then ids[state[ch].id] = nil end state[ch].id = nil state[ch].note = nil state[ch].initialTimbre = nil state[ch].initialPressure = nil end end
function sendXValue(value, id, ch) if id then if X_To.value == 2 then changeTune(id, value) elseif X_To.value == 3 then -- X to bipolar script modulation sendScriptModulation(2, value / PitchBendRange.value, 20, id) end end end
function onPitchBend(e) local ch = e.channel or 1 -- can happen if there is no channel like when sent from the UI local bend = PitchBendRange.value * e.bend
if ch == GlobalChannel.value then for i=1, 16 do if i ~= GlobalChannel.value then state[i].initialBend = bend sendXValue(bend, state[i].id, i) end end else state[ch].initialBend = bend sendXValue(bend, state[ch].id, ch) end end
function sendYValue(value, id, ch) if id then if Y_To.value == 2 then -- Y to PolyAT polyAfterTouch(value* 127, ids[id].note) elseif Y_To.value == 3 then -- Y to unipolar script modulation sendScriptModulation(1, value, 20, id) elseif Y_To.value == 4 then -- Y to bipolar script modulation if state[ch].initialTimbre ~= nil then -- check that we can be relative to something local newValue = nil if value >= state[ch].initialTimbre then newValue = (value - state[ch].initialTimbre) / (1. - state[ch].initialTimbre) else newValue = -(state[ch].initialTimbre - value) / (state[ch].initialTimbre) end sendScriptModulation(1, newValue, 20, id) end end end end
function onController(e) local cc = e.controller if cc == 74 then local ch = e.channel or 1 -- can happen if there is no channel like when sent from the UI local value = e.value / 127.
if ch == GlobalChannel.value then for i=1, 16 do if i ~= GlobalChannel.value then if state[i].initialTimbre == nil then state[i].initialTimbre = value end sendYValue(value, state[i].id, i) end end else if state[ch].initialTimbre == nil then state[ch].initialTimbre = value end sendYValue(value, state[ch].id, ch) end else postEvent(e) end end
function sendZValue(value, id, ch, immediate) if id then if Z_To.value == 2 then -- Z to gain local g = pressureToGain(value) local rampTime = 20 if immediate == true then rampTime = 0 end fade(id, g, rampTime) elseif Z_To.value == 3 then -- Z to polyAT polyAfterTouch(value * 127, ids[id].note) elseif Z_To.value == 4 then -- Z to unipolar script modulation sendScriptModulation(0, value, 20, id) elseif Z_To.value == 5 then -- Z to bipolar script modulation if state[ch].initialPressure ~= nil then -- check that we can be relative to something local newValue = nil if value >= state[ch].initialPressure then newValue = (value - state[ch].initialPressure) / (1. - state[ch].initialPressure) else newValue = -(state[ch].initialPressure - value) / (state[ch].initialPressure) end sendScriptModulation(0, newValue, 20, id) end end end end
function onAfterTouch(e) local ch = e.channel or 1 -- can happen if there is no channel like when sent from the UI local value = e.value / 127.
if ch == GlobalChannel.value then for i=1, 16 do if i ~= GlobalChannel.value then if state[i].initialPressure == nil then state[i].initialPressure = value end sendZValue(value, state[i].id, ch, false) end end else if state[ch].initialPressure == nil then state[ch].initialPressure = value end sendZValue(value, state[ch].id, ch, false) end end
